name: productivite
description: 10 expert skills for productivity and automation covering advanced spreadsheets (Excel/Sheets), presentations and visual storytelling, professional documents, workflow automation (N8N/Power Automate/Zapier/Make), no-code apps, knowledge management (Notion/Obsidian), digital collaboration, email and time management, AI copilots for augmented productivity, and visual design tools (Figma/Canva).
